Computation.Name: Exists
Computation.Query: (select (name id) (from user (with user_activity (where user (eq id (identifier "2875"))) (compute number_of_devices) (between now-7d now))

CompositeScore.Name: Compliance
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the overall measured Compliance score.

CompositeScore.Name: Security settings
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the overall measured Security settings score

CompositeScore.Name: Antivirus compliance
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the Antivirus compliance score

LeafScore.Name: Antivirus RTP
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the AV real time protection score. If protection is: • on -> 10. • at risk -> 0.

LeafScore.Name: Antivirus up-to-date
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the AV recentness score. If status is: • yes -> 10. • no -> 0.

CompositeScore.Name: Antispyware compliance
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the Antispyware compliance score

LeafScore.Name: Antispyware RTP
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the Antispyware real time protection score. If protection is: • on -> 10. • at risk -> 0.

LeafScore.Name: Antispyware up-to-date
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the Antispyware recentness score. If status is: • yes -> 10. • no -> 0.

CompositeScore.Name: Windows security settings score
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the Windows security settings score

LeafScore.Name: Internet Security settings
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the Internet security settings score. If protection is: • ok -> 10. • at risk -> 0.

LeafScore.Name: UAC status
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the UAC settings score. If status is: • ok -> 10. • at risk -> 0.

CompositeScore.Name: User compliance
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the User compliance score

LeafScore.Name: User privileges
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the User privileges compliance score. If privilege level is: • standard user -> 10. • power user -> 2. • administrator -> 8.

Computation.Name: Domain users with local admin privileges
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (where user (eq type (enum domain))) (compute highest_local_privilege_reached) (between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Execution path
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the Execution path compliance score: • If executions from removable are drive detected -> 0. • If not -> 10.

Computation.Name: Execution paths
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (where binary (eq paths (path "*RemovableDrive*"))) (compute number_of_executions) (between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Access to improper domains
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the compliance score for users accessing improper domains. If the number of domains is: • 0 Mb -> 10. • 0-5 domains -> 5. • more than 5 domains -> 0.

Computation.Name: Improper domain access
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with web_request (where domain (eq domain_category (string Games))) (where domain (eq domain_category (string "Network storage"))) (where domain (eq domain_category (string Peer-to-peer))) (where domain (eq domain_category (string "Proxy avoidance and hacking"))) (compute number_of_domains) (between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Threats
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the overall measured Threats score

CompositeScore.Name: Malware
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the malware compliance score

LeafScore.Name: High threats
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the high threats score. If the number of high threats is: • 0 -> 10. • 1 or more -> 0.

Computation.Name: High threats
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (where binary (eq threat_level (enum high))) (compute number_of_binaries) (between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Intermediate threats
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the intermediate threats score. If the number of intermediate threats is: • 0 -> 10. • 1-3 -> 5. • 4-5 -> 3. • more than 5 -> 0.

Computation.Name: Intermediate threats
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (where binary (eq threat_level (enum intermediate))) (compute number_of_binaries) (between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Dangerous domains
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the domain access compliance score

LeafScore.Name: Highly dangerous domains
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the access to highly dangerous domains score. If the number of high threats domains: • 0 -> 10. • 1 or more -> 0.

Computation.Name: Highly dangerous domains
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with web_request (where domain (eq threat_level (enum high))) (compute number_of_domains) (between now-7d now))))

Range.Label: Access to highly dangerous domains detected

LeafScore.Name: Moderately dangerous domains
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the access to moderately dangerous domains score. If the number of moderately domains is: • 0 -> 10. • 1-3 -> 5. • 4-5 -> 3. • more than 6 -> 0.

Computation.Name: Moderately dangerous domains
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with web_request (where domain (eq threat_level (enum intermediate))) (compute number_of_domains) (between now-7d now))))

Range.Label: no access to moderately dangerous domains
more than 5 moderately dangerous domains accessed

CompositeScore.Name: Operations
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the overall measured Operations score.

CompositeScore.Name: Health
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the device health score.

CompositeScore.Name: Disk health
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the disk health experience score.

LeafScore.Name: S.M.A.R.T index
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the S.M.A.R.T index score. If the S.M.A.R.T index is: • Less than 80% ==> 0. • If between 80% and 99.99% ==> 50. • If equal to 100% ==> 100. • If no info ==> " - ".

LeafScore.Name: System disk free space
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the system disk free space experience score. If the system drive usage: • more than 95% ==> 0. • If between 85% and 95% ==> 3. • If less than 85% ==> 10. "-"

LeafScore.Name: Disk throughput
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the disk throuhput experience score.

Computation.Name: Cumulated warning duration for high io usage usage last 7 days

CompositeScore.Name: CPU health

Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_warning (where device_warning (eq type (enum 'high memory usage'))) (compute cumulated_warning_duration) (between now-7d now))))

Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "application not responding"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between now-7d now)))

Document.Header: When installing new applications, some of them will auto-start at login. This might slowdown the device when the user login and deteriorate the end-user experience.

Section.Title: What are the applications using auto-start?
Section.Description: To know which applications are most impacting the login performance, check the output of the remote action "Get Startup Impact"

LeafScore.Description: Indicates the logon duration experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Extended logon duration
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the extended logon duration experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Boot speed
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the boot speed experience score.

CompositeScore.Name: Total time lost EUF
CompositeScore.Description: Computes the daily time lost by end-users due to IT issues. All output times are in hours.

LeafScore.Name: BSOD time lost score EUF
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the time lost due to Blue Screen Of Death. 1 BSOD = 5 min lost (1 BSOD is always followed by a hard reset in Nexthink, therefore the real time lost is 15 min).

Computation.Name: Number of BSOD (system crashes) last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum system_crash))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Hard reset time lost score EUF
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the time lost due to hard resets. 1 hard reset = 10 min lost.

Computation.Name: Number of hard resets last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum "hard reset"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Application crashes time lost score EUF
LeafScore.Description: Indicates time lost due to application crashes, including applications having a UI only. 1 application crash = 6 min lost.

Computation.Name: Number of application crashes last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "crash"))) (where binary (eq user_interface (boolean "true"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Application hangs time lost score EUF
LeafScore.Description: Indicates time lost due to application hangs, including applications having a UI only. 1 application hang = 6 min lost.

Computation.Name: Number of application hangs last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "application not responding"))) (where binary (eq user_interface (boolean "true"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Boot time lost EUF
CompositeScore.Description: Time lost due to machine boot (average boot time multiplied by number of boots).

LeafScore.Name: Average boot time
LeafScore.Description: Average boot time per device.

Computation.Name: Average boot duration last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with device_activity (compute average_boot_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Number of boots EUF
LeafScore.Description: Number of boots.

Computation.Name: Number of boots last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with device_activity (compute number_of_boots) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Extended logon time lost EUF
CompositeScore.Description: Time lost due to machine logon (average extended logon time multiplied by number of logons).

LeafScore.Name: Average extended logon time EUF
LeafScore.Description: Average extended logon time per device.

Computation.Name: Average extended logon duration duration last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with device_activity (compute average_extended_logon_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Number of logons EUF
LeafScore.Description: Number of logons.

Computation.Name: Number of logons last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with user_activity (compute number_of_logons) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Time lost due to high CPU EUF
CompositeScore.Description: Time spent by users on CPU higher than 70%, mulitplied by the device usage (otherwise the time could be very long if the user lets his device up all day and night long), multiplied by 0.1 since all the time spent on high CPU is not really lost.

LeafScore.Name: High overall CPU ratio
LeafScore.Description: High overall CPU ratio

Computation.Name: High overall CPU ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_overall_cpu_time_ratio) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Device usage last 1 day EUF
LeafScore.Description: Device usage last 1 day

Computation.Name: Device usage last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with user_activity (compute cumulated_interaction_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: CPU multiplying factor EUF
LeafScore.Description: We chose 0.1, it can be adapted.

Computation.Name: CPU multiplying factor
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Time lost due to high device memory EUF
CompositeScore.Description: Time spent by users on memory higher than 70%, mulitplied by the device usage (otherwise the time could be very long if the user lets his device up all day and night long), multiplied by 0.1 since all the time spent on high memory is not really lost.

LeafScore.Name: High device memory time ratio EUF

Computation.Name: High device memory time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_memory_time_ratio) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Device usage last 1 day (2) EUF
LeafScore.Description: Device usage last 1 day

Computation.Name: Device usage last 1 day (2)
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with user_activity (compute cumulated_interaction_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Memory multiplying factor EUF
LeafScore.Description: We chose 0.1, it can be adapted

Computation.Name: Memory multiplying factor
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Time lost due to high IO throughput time EUF
CompositeScore.Description: Time spent by users on high IO throughput, mulitplied by the device usage (otherwise the time could be very long if the user lets his device up all day and night long), multiplied by 0.1 since all the time spent on high IO throughput is not really lost.

LeafScore.Name: high device io throughput time ratio EUF

Computation.Name: high device io throughput time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_io_throughput_time_ratio) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Device usage last 1 day (3) EUF
LeafScore.Description: Device usage last 1 day

Computation.Name: Device usage last 1 day (3)
Computation.Query: (select (id name) (from device (with user_activity (compute cumulated_interaction_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: IO multiplying factor EUF
LeafScore.Description: We chose 0.1, it can be adapted

Computation.Name: IO multiplying factor
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Device compliance
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the device compliance score.

CompositeScore.Name: Protection
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the protection compliance score.

CompositeScore.Name: Antivirus
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the antivirus compliance score.

LeafScore.Name: Corporate antivirus
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the corporate antivirus score. If the corporate antivirus is: • Present ➔ 10. • Not present ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: Antivirus RTP
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the antivirus real time protection score. If the antivirus RTP status is: • on ➔ 10. • off ➔ 0. • unknown ➔ 0. • N/A ➔ 0. • " - " ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: Antivirus up-to-date
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the antivirus up-to-date score. If the corporate antivirus up-to-date status is: • yes ➔ 10. • no ➔ 0. • unknown ➔ 0. • N/A ➔ 0. • " - " ➔ 0.

CompositeScore.Name: Antispyware
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the antispyware compliance score.

LeafScore.Name: Corporate antispyware
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the corporate antispyware score. If the corporate antispyware is: • Present ➔ 10. • Not present ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: Antispyware RTP
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the antispyware real time protection score. If the antispyware RTP status is: • on ➔ 10. • off ➔ 0. • unknown ➔ 0. • N/A ➔ 0. • " - " ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: Antispyware up-to-date
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the antispyware up-to-date score. If the antispyware up-to-date status is: • yes ➔ 10. • no ➔ 0. • unknown ➔ 0. • N/A ➔ 0. • " - " ➔ 0.

CompositeScore.Name: Firewall
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the firewall compliance score.

LeafScore.Name: Corporate firewall
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the corporate firewall score. If the corporate firewall is: • Present ➔ 10. • Not present ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: Firewall RTP
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the firewall real time protection score. If the firewall RTP status is: • on ➔ 10. • off ➔ 0. • unknown ➔ 0. • N/A ➔ 0. • " - " ➔ 0.

CompositeScore.Name: System
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the system compliance score.

CompositeScore.Name: Operating system
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the operating system compliance score.

LeafScore.Name: Corporate OS
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the corporate OS score. If the operating system is: • Corporate ➔ 10. • Non-corporate ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: OS activation
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the Windows key activation score. If the license key is: • Activated ➔ 10. • Not activated ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: OS up-to-date
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the Windows up-to-date score. If the windows updates status is: • ok ➔ 10. • at risk ➔ 0. • unknown ➔ 0.

LeafScore.Name: WMI
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the WMI status score. If the WMI status is: • ok ➔ 10. • failure ➔ 0.

CompositeScore.Name: Privileges
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the privileges compliance score.

LeafScore.Name: Local administrators
LeafScore.Description: For non-whitelisted devices, indicates the local administrator score. If the highest local privilege reached is: • administrator ➔ 0. • super user ➔ 0. • standard user ➔ 10.

Computation.Name: Local administrators
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where device (ne #"Local admin white list" (enum "yes")))(compute highest_local_privilege_reached)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Administrator account
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the administrator account score. If the administrator account is: • enabled ➔ 0. • disabled ➔ 10.

LeafScore.Name: Guest account
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the guest account score. If the guest account is: • enabled ➔ 0. • disabled ➔ 10.

CompositeScore.Name: Software
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the software compliance score.

CompositeScore.Name: Browser
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the browser compliance.

LeafScore.Name: Corporate browser
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the corporate browser score. If the corporate browser is: • Present ➔ 10. • Not present ➔ 0.

Computation.Name: Corporate browser
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where binary (eq #"Compliance" (enum "corporate browser")))(where executable (eq #"Type" (enum "web browsers")))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Non corporate browser
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the non-corporate browser score. If non-corporate browsers are: • Present ➔ 0. • Not present ➔ 10.

Computation.Name: Non corporate browser
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where binary (ne #"Compliance" (enum "corporate browser")))(where executable (eq #"Type" (enum "web browsers")))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Other Software Compliance
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the blacklisted binaries and other software compliance.

LeafScore.Name: Blacklisted binaries
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the blacklisted binaries score. If blacklisted binaries are: • Present ➔ 0. • Not present ➔ 10.

Computation.Name: Blacklisted binaries
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where binary (eq #"Compliance" (enum "forbidden binaries")))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Non-compliant binary by version
LeafScore.Description: Indicates a non-compliant binaries score. If non-compliant binary versions are: • Present ➔ 0. • Not present ➔ 10.

Computation.Name: Non-compliant binary version
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where binary (eq #"Compliance" (enum "non-compliant binary version")))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Network
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the network compliance score.

LeafScore.Name: Proxy
LeafScore.Description: For a list of devices, indicates the proxy score. If the endpoint reaches IP addresses that are: • internal ➔ 10. • external ➔ 0.

Computation.Name: Proxy
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from (device)(with connection(where device (ne #"Proxy white list" (enum "yes")))(where destination (eq "ip_address" (ip_address "external")))(compute number_of_connections)(between now-7d now)))

LeafScore.Name: Blacklisted domains
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the blacklisted domains score. If blacklisted domains are: • Reached ➔ 0. • Not reached ➔ 10.

Computation.Name: Blacklisted domains
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with web_request(where domain (eq #"Compliance" (enum "forbidden domains")))(compute number_of_web_requests)(between now-7d now))))

ScopeQuery.Filtering: (where device(ne device_type (enum server))(lt number_of_days_since_last_seen (integer 7)))(where device(eq device_type (enum server))(eq #"Virtualization type" (enum "Session-Based Computing (SBC)"))(lt number_of_days_since_last_seen (integer 7)))

CompositeScore.Name: DEX - Device
CompositeScore.Description: DXS version: 2.0.1 - The ability of the employee to start and use Windows and the device without interruption (device reliability) and with good response times (device performance). It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint and on the user sentiment collected via Nexthink Engage.

CompositeScore.Name: Device performance
CompositeScore.Description: The ability of the employee to start and use Windows and the device with good response times (device performance).

CompositeScore.Name: Device — Boot duration
CompositeScore.Description: Boot experience

LeafScore.Name: Boot speed
LeafScore.Description: Full boot duration baseline

LeafScore.Name: Device — Boot speed (Fast Startup)
LeafScore.Description: Fast startup boot duration baseline

Document.Header: Score based on the boot speed (full boot and Fast Startup).

CompositeScore.Name: Logon
CompositeScore.Description: Logon Experience

LeafScore.Name: Logon duration
LeafScore.Description: Average user logon duration

Document.Header: Score based on the current average user logon duration.

LeafScore.Name: Extended logon duration
LeafScore.Description: Average user extended logon duration

Document.Header: Score based on the current average user extended logon duration.
Evaluate the logon experience. It is computed based on a weighted average of the values of its leaf scores.

CompositeScore.Name: Agents impact
CompositeScore.Description: Impact of the configured agents on the device performance

LeafScore.Name: Crash
LeafScore.Description: Number of agents crashes during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Crash
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (ne #"DEX - Agents" nil))(compute number_of_application_crashes)(between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: Score based on the number of agents crashes during the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: Freezes
LeafScore.Description: Number of agents freezes (not responding events) during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Freezes
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (ne #"DEX - Agents" nil))(compute number_of_application_not_responding_events)(between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: Score based on the number of agents freezes (not responding events) during the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: High CPU time ratio
LeafScore.Description: Ratio between the time that the underlying executions of the configured agents are in high thread CPU usage and their execution duration during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: High CPU time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_warning(where binary (ne #"DEX - Agents" nil))(compute high_application_thread_cpu_time_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: Score based on the ratio between the time that the underlying executions of the configured agents are in high thread CPU usage and their execution duration during the last 7 days.
Evaluate the impact of the configured agents on the device performance. It is computed based on a weighted average of the values of its leaf scores.

CompositeScore.Name: High IO and page fault time
CompositeScore.DisplayName: Device — High IO and page fault time

LeafScore.Name: High Page fault time
LeafScore.Description: High device page faults time ratio of the device during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: High Page fault time
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with device_warning(between now-7d now)(compute high_device_page_faults_time_ratio))))

Document.Header: Score based on the high device page faults time ratio of the device during the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: High IO time
LeafScore.Description: High device IO throughput time ratio of the device during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: High IO time
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with device_warning(between now-7d now)(compute high_device_io_throughput_time_ratio))))

Document.Header: Score based on the high device IO throughput time ratio of the device during the last 7 days.

CompositeScore.Name: High CPU and memory time
CompositeScore.DisplayName: Device — High CPU and memory time

LeafScore.Name: CPU usage
LeafScore.Description: High device overall cpu time ratio of the device during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: CPU usage
Computation.Description: High device overall cpu time ratio during the last last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with device_warning(between now-7d now)(compute high_device_overall_cpu_time_ratio))))

Document.Header: Score based on the high device overall cpu time ratio of the device during the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: Memory usage
LeafScore.Description: High device overall memory time ratio of the device during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Memory usage
Computation.Description: High device overall memory time ratio during the last last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id name)(from device(with device_warning(between now-7d now)(compute high_device_memory_time_ratio))))

Document.Header: Score based on the high device overall memory time ratio of the device during the last 7 days.
Evaluate the responsivness of the device. It is computed based on a mutlipication of the values of its leaf scores and behaves as follows:

Section.Title: Good experience
Section.Description: If none of its leaf score has a very low score, nor all of them have average scores, it is green.

Section.Title: Average experience
Section.Description: If only one of its leaf score has a low score, or several of them have average scores, it is yellow

Section.Title: Frustrating experience
Section.Description: If at least two of its leaf scores have low scores, it is red

LeafScore.Name: System free space
LeafScore.Description: Free space on the system drive

Document.Header: Score based on the current free space on the system drive.

CompositeScore.Name: Virtual session
CompositeScore.Description: V1 - Virtualization experience

LeafScore.Name: Citrix RTT
LeafScore.Description: V1 - Average round-time trip for Citrix sessions over the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Citrix RTT
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with session_performance (compute average_citrix_rtt) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: Score based on the average round-trip time (for Citrix only) for the sessions on the virtual client during the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: Session network latency
LeafScore.Description: V1 - Average network latency for virtual sessions over the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Session network latency
Computation.Description: Average network latency for virtual sessions over the last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with session_performance (compute average_session_network_latency) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: Score based on the average network latency for the sessions on the virtual client during the last 7 days.
Evaluate the ability of the employee to use the device with good response times (device performance). It is computed based on a weighted average of the value of its leaf scores.

CompositeScore.Name: Device reliability
CompositeScore.Description: The ability of the employee to use the device without interruption (device reliability).

LeafScore.Name: BSODs

Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with device_error(where device_error (eq type (enum system_crash)))(compute number_of_errors)(between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: Score based on the number of system crashes during the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: Application crashes
LeafScore.Description: Number of application crashes on the device during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Application crashes

LeafScore.Name: Application freezes

Evaluate the ability of the employee to start and use the business applications (other than the productivity and collaboration suite and corporate browsers) smoothly and with good response times. It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint.

ScopeQuery.Filtering: (where device(ne device_type (enum server))(lt number_of_days_since_last_seen (integer 7)))(where device(eq device_type (enum server))(eq #"Virtualization type" (enum "Session-Based Computing (SBC)"))(lt number_of_days_since_last_seen (integer 7)))

CompositeScore.Name: DEX - User sentiments
CompositeScore.Description: V2 - The sentiments of the users who answered the campaign.

CompositeScore.Name: Device sentiment
CompositeScore.Description: V2 - The feelings and perceptions of the end user when interacting with the corporate devices. It is based on user sentiment collected via Nexthink Engage.

Computation.Name: Score from user
Computation.Description: Employee Sentiment
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with user_activity(where user(eq #"campaign:DEX - Employee sentiment/Device sentiment" (string "1"))(lt #"campaign:DEX - Employee sentiment/Number of days since last action" (integer 28)))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

ScopeQuery.Filtering: (where device(ne device_type (enum server))(lt number_of_days_since_last_seen (integer 7)))(where device(eq device_type (enum server))(eq #"Virtualization type" (enum "Session-Based Computing (SBC)"))(lt number_of_days_since_last_seen (integer 7)))

CompositeScore.Description: DXS version: 1.0.1 - The sentiments of the users who answered the campaign.

Computation.Name: Device sentiment
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with user_activity(where user (eq #"campaign:Employee Satisfaction/Status" (string "fully"))(eq #"campaign:Employee Satisfaction/Follow-up" (string "performance"))(lt #"campaign:Employee Satisfaction/Number of days since last action" (integer 28)))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

Computation.Description: Check that the WPS campaign was fully answered.

CompositeScore.Name: Word
CompositeScore.Description: The ability of the employee to use Microsoft Word smoothly and with good response times. It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint.

LeafScore.Name: Word crashes
LeafScore.Description: Number of Word crashes during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Crashes
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (eq #"DXS - Binary" (enum Word)))(compute application_crash_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Word freezes
LeafScore.Description: Number of Word freezes (not responding events) during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Freezes
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (eq #"DXS - Binary" (enum Word)))(compute application_not_responding_event_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Description: The ability of the employee to use SharePoint smoothly and with good response times. It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint.

LeafScore.Name: SharePoint request duration
LeafScore.Description: Average web request duration for connections to SharePoint during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Web request duration
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with web_request(where binary (eq #"DXS - Binary" (enum "web browsers")))(where domain (eq #"DXS - Domain" (enum SharePoint)))(where web_request (lt incoming_traffic (byte 1000000))(gt incoming_traffic (byte 100000))(gt web_request_duration (millisecond 1000)))(where web_request (lt incoming_traffic (byte 1000000))(lt web_request_duration (millisecond 1000)))(compute average_request_duration)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: SharePoint response time
LeafScore.Description: Average network response time for connections of the SharePoint during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Network response time
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with web_request(where binary (eq #"DXS - Binary" (enum "web browsers")))(where domain (eq #"DXS - Domain" (enum SharePoint)))(compute average_network_response_time)(between now-7d now))))

Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (eq #"DXS for macOS - Binary" (enum OneDrive)))(compute application_not_responding_event_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: OneDrive connectivity
LeafScore.Description: Ratio of successful network connections started by OneDrive during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Connectivity
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with connection(where binary (eq #"DXS for macOS - Binary" (enum OneDrive)))(compute successful_connections_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: OneDrive response time
LeafScore.Description: Average network response time for connections started by OneDrive during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Network response time
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with connection(where binary (eq #"DXS for macOS - Binary" (enum OneDrive)))(compute average_network_response_time)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: DXS for macOS - Security
CompositeScore.Description: DEX version: 1.0.0 - The extent to which the OS, Antivirus and Firewall protect the employee digital experience. It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint.

LeafScore.Name: AV RTP
LeafScore.Description: Status of the antivirus real time protection

Computation.Name: AV running
Computation.Description: Check if there is an AV running on the computers
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where binary (eq #"DXS for macOS - Binary" (enum Antivirus)))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-1d now))))

LeafScore.Name: High threat binaries
LeafScore.Description: Number of "high threat" suspicious binaries executions during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Suspicious binaries
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where binary (eq threat_level (enum high)))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: DXS for macOS - Web browsing
CompositeScore.Description: DEX version: 1.0.0 - The ability of the employee to start the browser and navigate the web smoothly and with good response times. It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint.

LeafScore.Name: Browser crashes
LeafScore.Description: Number of browser crashes during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Crashes
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (eq #"DXS for macOS - Binary" (enum "web browsers")))(compute application_crash_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Browser freezes
LeafScore.Description: Number of browser freezes (not responding events) during the last 7 days

Computation.Name: Freezes
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(where binary (eq #"DXS for macOS - Binary" (enum "web browsers")))(compute application_not_responding_event_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

Computation.Name: Score from user
Computation.Description: Employee Sentiment
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with user_activity (where user (eq #"campaign:Employee Satisfaction/Satisfaction" (string "7")) (lt #"campaign:Employee Satisfaction/Number of days since last action" (integer 28))) (between now-7d now) (compute number_of_users) )))

CompositeScore.Description: Index of Persona traits based on usage patterns of the employee.

CompositeScore.Name: Work Style
CompositeScore.Description: Persona traits indicating different work styles by the employee.

LeafScore.Name: Recently Seen Employee
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating if the employee has been recently seen.

LeafScore.Name: Shadow IT
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating usage by the employee of non-corporate or forbidden applications.

Computation.Name: Shadow IT
Computation.Description: Indicates the focus duration of non-corporate or forbidden applications by employee in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with execution(where binary(eq #"Persona - Binary Compliance" (enum "forbidden binaries")))(compute focus_time)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Admin Rights
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating if the user has admin privileges.

Computation.Name: High Privileged Executions
Computation.Description: Indicates if the user used Admin Privileges in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with execution(where execution (eq privilege_level (enum "power user")))(where execution (eq privilege_level (enum "administrator")))(compute number_of_executions)(between now-7d now))))

Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with web_request(where domain (eq #"Persona - Domain Profile" (enum "ReferenceDomains")))(compute cumulated_web_interaction_duration)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Social Platform Consumer
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating time spent by the employee on Social platforms.

Computation.Name: Social Platform
Computation.Description: Indicates the amount of time spent by the employee on Social Platform domains in the last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with web_request(where domain (eq #"Persona - Domain Profile" (enum "SocialDomains")))(compute cumulated_web_interaction_duration)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Hardware Configuration
CompositeScore.Description: Persona traits indicating usage by the employee of Hardware.

LeafScore.Name: Multiple Device Consumer
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating the number of devices used by the employee.

Computation.Name: Number of devices
Computation.Description: Indicates the number of devices used by the employee in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user_activity (eq type (enum "interaction" )))(compute number_of_devices)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Multiple Screen Consumer
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating the number of screens used by the employee.

Computation.Name: Number of screens
Computation.Description: Indicates the number of screens used by the employee in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where device(ge number_of_monitors (integer 2))(eq #"Virtualization type" (enum "Non-virtual")))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

LeafScore.Name: Deskbound Employee
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating if the employee uses desktop devices.

Computation.Name: Desktop
Computation.Description: Indicates if the employee uses Desktops in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user_activity (eq type (enum "interaction" )))(where device (eq #"Persona - Device Profile" (enum "Corporate Desktop")))(compute cumulated_interaction_duration)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Laptop Based Employee
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating if the employee uses laptop devices.

Computation.Name: Laptop
Computation.Description: Indicates if the employee uses Laptop devices in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user_activity (eq type (enum "interaction" )))(where device (eq #"Persona - Device Profile" (enum "Corporate Laptop")))(compute cumulated_interaction_duration)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating how much the employee uses the device.

Computation.Name: Cumulated Interaction
Computation.Description: Indicates how much the employee uses the device in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user_activity (eq type (enum "interaction" )))(compute cumulated_interaction_duration)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Network Traffic Consumer
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating the amount of Network (LAN) traffic consumption by the employee.

Computation.Name: Network Traffic
Computation.Description: Indicates the amount of Network (LAN) traffic consumption by the employee in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with connection(compute total_network_traffic)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Web Traffic Consumer
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating the amount of Web traffic consumption by the employee.

Computation.Name: Web Traffic
Computation.Description: Indicates the amount of Web traffic consumption by the employee in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with web_request(compute total_web_traffic)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Multiple Apps Usage
LeafScore.Description: Persona trait indicating if the employee runs multiple UI-based applications.

Computation.Name: Number of UI Based Applications
Computation.Description: Indicates the number of UI-based applications executed by the user in the last 7 days.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with execution(where binary(ne application_name (pattern "*Windows Operating System kernel components*"))(eq user_interface (boolean "1")))(where execution(gt focus_time (millisecond 0)))(compute number_of_applications)(between now-7d now))))

Computation.Name: Not engaged and low DEX
Computation.Description: Indicates the users with a low Engagement Persona Trait and with a low DEX score.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user(le #"score:Persona Advanced Traits/Pulse Survey" (real "5")))(where device(le #"score:DEX - Digital Experience Score/DEX - Digital Experience Score" (real "7")))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

LeafScore.Name: Power Worker
LeafScore.Description: Persona indicating if an employee is a Power Worker.

Computation.Name: High Device and High CPU and High Memory
Computation.Description: Indicates the Power Worker employees.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user(ge #"score:Persona Traits/Multiple Apps Usage" (real "0"))(ge #"score:Persona Traits/CPU Intensive" (real "8"))(ge #"score:Persona Traits/Memory Intensive" (real "8")))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

LeafScore.Name: Knowledge Worker
LeafScore.Description: Persona indicating if an employee is a Knowledge Worker.

Computation.Name: Researcher trait or Online learner trait
Computation.Description: Indicates the Knowledge Worker employees.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user (ge #"score:Persona Traits/Research Platform Consumer" (real "1.3")))(where user (ge #"score:Persona Traits/Online Learning Consumer" (real "5")))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

LeafScore.Name: Productive and Motivated
LeafScore.Description: Persona indicating if an employee is productive and motivated.

Computation.Name: ProductiveAndMotivated
Computation.Description: Indicates the employees that are productive and motivated.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user (ge #"score:Persona Traits/Social Platform Consumer" (real "8"))(ge #"score:Persona Traits/Email Tools" (real "8"))(ge #"score:Persona Traits/Collaboration Tools" (real "8")))(where user (ge #"score:Persona Advanced Traits/Pulse Survey" (real "8")))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

LeafScore.Name: Engaged
LeafScore.Description: Persona indicating if an employee is Engaged.

Computation.Name: Engaed
Computation.Description: Indicates the employees that are Engaged.
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from user(with user_activity(where user (ge #"score:Persona Advanced Traits/Responsive" (real "8"))(ge #"score:Persona Traits/Device Usage" (real "1")))(between now-7d now)(compute number_of_users))))

CompositeScore.Name: Storage
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the storage experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Health
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the disk health experience score. If the S.M.A.R.T index is: • Less than 80% ==> 0. • If between 80% and 99.99% ==> 50. • If equal to 100% ==> 100. • If no info ==> " - ".

CompositeScore.Name: Free space
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the free disk space experience score.

LeafScore.Name: System free space
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the system free space experience score. If the system drive free space is: • Less than 5GB ==> 0. • If between 5 and 20GB ==> 50. • If more than 20GB ==> 100. • If no info ==> "-"

LeafScore.Name: Non-system free space
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the non-system free space experience score. If the system drive free space is: • Less than 5GB ==> 0. • If between 5 and 20GB ==> 50. • If more than 20GB ==> 100. • If no info ==> "-"

LeafScore.Name: End-user time lost
LeafScore.Description: Average daily time lost per user due to IT issues.

Field.Name: #campaign:Time lost because of IT issues/Time lost estimation

LeafScore.Name: End-user time lost - equivalent cost
LeafScore.Description: Average daily cost per user due to time lost. The assumption here is 1 hour = 15€.

Field.Name: #campaign:Time lost because of IT issues/Time lost estimation

CompositeScore.Name: Total time lost
CompositeScore.Description: Computes the daily time lost by end-users due to IT issues. All output times are in hours.

LeafScore.Name: BSOD time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the time lost due to Blue Screen Of Death. 1 BSOD = 5 min lost (1 BSOD is always followed by a hard reset in Nexthink, therefore the real time lost is 15 min).

Computation.Name: Number of BSOD (system crashes) last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum system_crash))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Hard reset time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the time lost due to hard resets. 1 hard reset = 10 min lost.

Computation.Name: Number of hard resets last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum "hard reset"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Application crashes time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates time lost due to application crashes, including applications having a UI only. 1 application crash = 6 min lost.

Computation.Name: Number of application crashes last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "crash"))) (where binary (eq user_interface (boolean "true"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Application hangs time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates time lost due to application hangs, including applications having a UI only. 1 application hang = 6 min lost.

Computation.Name: Number of application hangs last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "application not responding"))) (where binary (eq user_interface (boolean "true"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Boot time lost
CompositeScore.Description: Time lost due to machine boot (average boot time multiplied by number of boots).

LeafScore.Name: Average boot time
LeafScore.Description: Average boot time per device.

Computation.Name: Average boot duration last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_activity (compute average_boot_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Number of boots
LeafScore.Description: Number of boots.

Computation.Name: Number of boots last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_activity (compute number_of_boots) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Extended logon time lost
CompositeScore.Description: Time lost due to machine logon (average extended logon time multiplied by number of logons).

LeafScore.Name: Average extended logon time
LeafScore.Description: Average extended logon time per device.

Computation.Name: Average extended logon duration duration last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_activity (compute average_extended_logon_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Number of logons
LeafScore.Description: Number of logons.

Computation.Name: Number of logons last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with user_activity (compute number_of_logons) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Time lost due to high CPU
CompositeScore.Description: Time spent by users on CPU higher than 70%, mulitplied by the device usage (otherwise the time could be very long if the user lets his device up all day and night long), multiplied by 0.1 since all the time spent on high CPU is not really lost.

LeafScore.Name: High overall CPU ratio
LeafScore.Description: High overall CPU ratio

Computation.Name: High overall CPU ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_overall_cpu_time_ratio) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Device usage last 1 day
LeafScore.Description: Device usage last 1 day

Computation.Name: Device usage last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with user_activity (compute cumulated_interaction_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: CPU multiplying factor
LeafScore.Description: We chose 0.1, it can be adapted.

Computation.Name: CPU multiplying factor
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Time lost due to high device memory
CompositeScore.Description: Time spent by users on memory higher than 70%, mulitplied by the device usage (otherwise the time could be very long if the user lets his device up all day and night long), multiplied by 0.1 since all the time spent on high memory is not really lost.

Computation.Name: High device memory time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_memory_time_ratio) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Device usage last 1 day (2)
LeafScore.Description: Device usage last 1 day

Computation.Name: Device usage last 1 day (2)
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with user_activity (compute cumulated_interaction_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Memory multiplying factor
LeafScore.Description: We chose 0.1, it can be adapted

Computation.Name: Memory multiplying factor
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Time lost due to high IO throughput time
CompositeScore.Description: Time spent by users on high IO throughput, mulitplied by the device usage (otherwise the time could be very long if the user lets his device up all day and night long), multiplied by 0.1 since all the time spent on high IO throughput is not really lost.

LeafScore.Name: high device io throughput time ratio

Computation.Name: high device io throughput time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_io_throughput_time_ratio) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Device usage last 1 day (3)
LeafScore.Description: Device usage last 1 day

Computation.Name: Device usage last 1 day (3)
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with user_activity (compute cumulated_interaction_duration) (between midnight-1d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: IO multiplying factor

Computation.Name: IO multiplying factor
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Total time lost - equivalent cost
CompositeScore.Description: Computes the cost due to IT issues encountered by end-users. To do so, we multiply the time lost (in hours, computed in another score) by the average cost hourly work cost (15€).

LeafScore.Name: Time lost score
LeafScore.Description: See details in the Total time lost score

LeafScore.Name: Work cost multiplying factor
LeafScore.Description: Multiplying factor representing the cost of 1h of a worker (assumption is 15€)

Computation.Name: Cost multiplying factor (hourly)
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

CompositeScore.Name: Total time lost - 7 day average
CompositeScore.Description: Same score as Total time lost score but computed as an average on the last 7 days, and in minutes. We therefore need to divide the results by 7 as they sum on the last 7 days.

LeafScore.Name: Avg BSOD time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the time lost due to Blue Screen Of Death. 1 BSOD = 5 min lost (1 BSOD is always followed by a hard reset in Nexthink, therefore the real time lost is 15 min).

Computation.Name: Avg Number of system crashes last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum system_crash))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-7d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Avg Hard reset time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates the time lost due to hard resets. 1 hard reset = 10 min lost.

Computation.Name: Avg Avg Number of hard reset last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum "hard reset"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-7d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Avg Application crashes time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates time lost due to application crashes, including applications having a UI only. 1 application crash = 6 min lost.

Computation.Name: Avg Number of application crashes last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "crash"))) (where binary (eq user_interface (boolean "true"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-7d midnight))))

LeafScore.Name: Avg Application hangs time lost score
LeafScore.Description: Indicates time lost due to application hangs, including applications having a UI only. 1 application hang = 6 min lost.

Computation.Name: Avg Number of application hangs last 1 day
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "application not responding"))) (where binary (eq user_interface (boolean "true"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between midnight-7d midnight))))

CompositeScore.Name: Total time lost - 7 day average - equivalent cost
CompositeScore.Description: Computes the cost due to IT issues encountered by end-users. To do so, we multiply the time lost (in minutes, computed in another score) by the average work cost of a minute of work (0.25€).

LeafScore.Name: Total time lost - 7 day average
LeafScore.Description: See details in the Total time lost - 7 day average score

Field.Name: #score:Total time lost - 7 day average/Total time lost - 7 day average

LeafScore.Name: Work cost multiplying factor
LeafScore.Description: Multiplying factor representing the cost of 1 minute of a worker (assumption is 0.25€ ie 15€/hour)

Computation.Name: Cost multiplying factor (minute)
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

LeafScore.Name: Potential Savings
LeafScore.Description: Difference between the cost of replacing all evaluated devices and the computed refreshment cost

Field.Name: #score:Hardware asset renewal costs/Hardware asset renewal costs

CompositeScore.Name: Hardware asset renewal costs
CompositeScore.Description: Compute the total cost of replacing, rebuilding, or upgrading a device

LeafScore.Name: Replacement costs
LeafScore.Description: Cost of replacing a device

LeafScore.Name: Rebuild costs
LeafScore.Description: Cost of rebuilding a device

LeafScore.Name: Memory upgrade costs
LeafScore.Description: Cost of upgrading the memory of a device

Computation.Name: Memory upgrade costs for non-replaced devices
Computation.Description: Get the high memory score of devices not to be replaced
Computation.Query: (select (id #"score:DEX - Device/Memory usage")(from device(where device (le #"score:DEX - Device/DEX - Device" (real 7.0)))))

LeafScore.Name: Disk upgrade costs
LeafScore.Description: Cost of upgrading the disk of a device

Computation.Name: Disk upgrade cost for non-replaced devices
Computation.Description: Get the disk health score of devices not to be replaced
Computation.Query: (select (id disks_smart_index)(from device(where device (le #"score:DEX - Device/DEX - Device" (real 7.0)))))

CompositeScore.Name: Hardware refresh
CompositeScore.Description: Compute the need to replace or upgrade a device

LeafScore.Name: Disk health score
LeafScore.Description: SMART index from 0 to 10 (0% to 100%)

Document.Header: The score increases linearly with the value of the disk SMART index from 0 (0% index) to 10 (100% index).

CompositeScore.Name: Startup score
CompositeScore.Description: Average of boot and logon scores

LeafScore.Name: Boot duration score
LeafScore.Description: The faster the boot time the higher the score

Document.Header: The score is 10 when the boot time lies between 0 to 10 seconds. The score decreases linearly with longer boot times until it reaches value 0 when the boot time is 60 seconds or more.

LeafScore.Name: Logon duration score
LeafScore.Description: The faster the logon time the higher the score

Document.Header: The score is 10 when the boot time lies between 0 to 20 seconds. The score decreases linearly with longer boot times until it reaches value 0 when the boot time is 180 seconds or more.
The total score for device startup time. Calculated as the average of the boot and logon scores.

CompositeScore.Name: Device stability
CompositeScore.Description: Average of system crashes and hard resets scores

LeafScore.Name: System crashes score
LeafScore.Description: The fewer the system crashes the higher the score

Computation.Name: Number of system crashes last 7 days
Computation.Description: Compute the number of system crashes
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum system_crash))) (compute number_of_errors) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: The score is 10 when there have been no system crashes. The score decreases linearly with the number of system crashes until it reaches value 0 when the number of crashes is 2 or more.

LeafScore.Name: Hard resets score
LeafScore.Description: The fewer the hard resets the higher the score

Computation.Name: Number of hard resets for the last 7 days
Computation.Description: Compute the number of abrupt shutdowns
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_error (where device_error (eq type (enum 'hard reset'))) (compute number_of_errors) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: The score is 10 when there have been no hard resets. The score decreases linearly with the number of hard resets until it reaches value 0 when the number of hard resets is 5 or more.
The total score for device stability. Calculated as the average of the scores on system crashes and hard resets.

CompositeScore.Name: Application stability
CompositeScore.Description: Average of application crashes and application hangs scores

LeafScore.Name: Application crashes score
LeafScore.Description: The fewer crashes the higher the score

Computation.Name: Number of application crashes last 7 days
Computation.Description: Compute the number of application crashes
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum crash))) (compute number_of_errors) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: The score is 10 when there have been no application crashes. The score decreases linearly with the number of application crashes until it reaches value 0 when the number of crashes is 10 or more.

LeafScore.Name: Application hangs score
LeafScore.Description: The fewer the application not responding events the higher the score

Computation.Name: Number of application hangs last 7 days
Computation.Description: Compute the number of application not responding events
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution_error (where execution_error (eq type (enum "application not responding"))) (compute number_of_errors) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: The score is 10 when there have been no application not responding events (hangs). The score decreases linearly with the number of application hangs until it reaches value 0 when the number of hangs is 10 or more.
The total score for application stability. Calculated as the average of the scores on application crashes and application not responding events.

CompositeScore.Name: Performance
CompositeScore.Description: Average of high CPU and high memory scores

LeafScore.Name: High CPU score
LeafScore.Description: The lower the percentage of time in high CPU the higher the score

Computation.Name: High CPU time ratio last 7 days
Computation.Description: Compute the percentage of High CPU time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_overall_cpu_time_ratio) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: The score is 10 when the device has spent no time in high CPU load. The score decreases linearly with the ratio of time spent in high CPU load, reaching value 0 when the percentage of time in high CPU condition is 10% or more.

LeafScore.Name: High memory score
LeafScore.Description: The lower the percentage of time in high memory the higher the score

Computation.Name: High Memory time ratio last 7 days
Computation.Description: Compute the percentage of High memory time ratio
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with device_warning (compute high_device_memory_time_ratio) (between now-7d now))))

Document.Header: The score is 10 when the device has spent no time in high memory condition. The score decreases linearly with the ratio of time spent with high memory consumption, reaching value 0 when the percentage of time in high memory condition is 10% or more.
The total score for device performance. Calculated as the average of the scores on high CPU and high memory usage.
Find out if you need to replace a device or upgrade its hardware based on the actual status and usage of its hardware resources. The score is calculated as the average of all its subscores.

Section.Title: Keep (Green)
Section.Description: Devices with a score of 8 or higher do not need a deep hardware refreshment, with the possible exception of a disk or a memory upgrade.

Section.Title: Rebuild (Yellow)
Section.Description: Devices with a score between 6 and 8 need a CPU / motherboard refreshment. An additional disk or memory upgrade may be required.

Section.Title: Replace (Red)
Section.Description: Devices with a score lower than 6 need to be replaced by a new device.

Computation.Name: Mobile connection

Computation.Name: Unknown connections

Document.Header: Helping to analyze troubles in Skype for Business by providing some aggregated information about the Skype for Business client's behavior during the last 24 hours

Section.Title: Calls definitions:
Section.Description: - Video: has audio and video streams. If video is added to an ongoing audio call, it will be recognized as a video call
- Screen sharing: it consists in sharing the screen or an application window

Section.Title: Calls statuses:
Section.Description: - Successful: established and ended without any problem
- Failed: could not be established or was not received by the destination, due to external problems (typically network issues)
- Dropped: established correctly but due to external problems it was cancelled
- Poor: established correctly and has some quality issues. It may become dropped if not finished properly
- Rejected: cancelled by the caller or declined by the receiver before being established. NOT CONSIDERED IN THIS SCOREBOARD

Section.Title: NOTE:
Section.Description: For Tracing levels different than "Full" or "Light" the Remote Action could not be able to extract and analyze the necessary information. Please make sure the value is "Full" or "Light" before checking the rest of the scores

CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the ethernet experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Failed web requests
LeafScore.Description: If the successful HTTP request ratio is: • 0-90% ➔ 0 • 90-98% ➔ 5 • Higher than 98% ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Successful http request ratio last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with web_request(compute successful_http_requests_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Connectivity
LeafScore.Description: If the successful connection ratio is: • 0-95% ➔ 0 • 95-99% ➔ 5 • Higher than 99% ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Successful connections ratio last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with connection(compute successful_connections_ratio)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Response time
LeafScore.Description: If the average network response time is: • More than 100ms ➔ 0 • 50-100ms ➔ 2 • 25-50ms ➔ 5 • 10-25ms ➔ 8 • 0-10ms ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Response time last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with connection(compute average_network_response_time)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Device stability
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the stability experience score.

LeafScore.Name: BSOD
LeafScore.Description: If the number of BSODs is: • 1 or more ➔ 0 • 0 ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Number of system crashes last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with device_error(where device_error (eq type (enum system_crash)))(compute number_of_errors)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Hard reset
LeafScore.Description: If the number of hard resets is: • 4 or more ➔ 0 • 2 or 3 ➔ 3 • 1 ➔ 7 • 0 ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Number of hard reset last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with device_error(where device_error (eq type (enum "hard reset")))(compute number_of_errors)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: WMI
LeafScore.Description: If the WIM status is: • failure ➔ 0 • ok ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

CompositeScore.Name: Software
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the software experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Number of packages
LeafScore.Description: If the number of packages is: • 500 or more ➔ 0 • 250-499 ➔ 2 • 150-249 ➔ 5 • 75-149 ➔ 8 • 0-74 ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Number of packages
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq type (enum program)))(compute number_of_packages))))

LeafScore.Name: Software age
LeafScore.Description: If the number of legacy executables is: • 10 or more ➔ 0 • 5-9 ➔ 3 • 2-4 ➔ 7 • 0 or 1 ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Number of old executables
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution(where executable (eq #"Legacy software" (enum yes)))(compute number_of_executables)(between now-7d now)))

CompositeScore.Name: Software stability
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the software stability experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Software crashes
LeafScore.Description: If the number of application crashes is: • 5 or more ➔ 0 • 3 or 4 ➔ 2 • 2 ➔ 5 • 1 crash ➔ 8 • 0 ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Number of application crash last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(compute number_of_application_crashes)(between now-7d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Software freezes
LeafScore.Description: If the number of application freezes is: • 5 or more ➔ 0 • 3 or 4 ➔ 2 • 2 ➔ 5 • 1 ➔ 8 • 0 ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Number of application freeze last 7 days
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with execution_error(compute number_of_application_not_responding_events)(between now-7d now))))

CompositeScore.Name: Startup
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the startup experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Boot speed
LeafScore.Description: If the boot duration is: • More than 2 minutes ➔ 0 • 1-2 minutes ➔ 2 • 30 seconds - 1 minute ➔ 5 • 15-30 seconds ➔ 8 • Less than 15 seconds ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

CompositeScore.Name: Logon speed
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the logon experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Logon duration
LeafScore.Description: If the logon duration is: • More than 2 minutes ➔ 0 • 1-2 minutes ➔ 2 • 30 seconds - 1 minute ➔ 5 • 15-30 seconds ➔ 8 • Less than 15 seconds ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

LeafScore.Name: Extended logon duration
LeafScore.Description: If the extended logon duration is: • More than 6 minutes ➔ 0 • 3-6 minutes ➔ 2 • 90 seconds to 3 minutes ➔ 5 • 45-90 seconds ➔ 8 • Less than 45 seconds ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

CompositeScore.Name: Storage
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the storage experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Health
LeafScore.Description: If the S.M.A.R.T index is: • Less than 80% ➔ 0 • 80-99.9% ➔ 5 • 100% ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

CompositeScore.Name: Free space
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates the free disk space experience score.

LeafScore.Name: Non-system drive free space (%)
LeafScore.Description: If the non-system drive usage is: • More than 90% ➔ 0 • 80-90% ➔ 2 • 65-80% ➔ 5 • 50-65% ➔ 8 • Less than 50% ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

Computation.Name: Non system drive usage
Computation.Query: (select (id total_nonsystem_drive_usage) (from device(where device(gt total_nonsystem_drive_capacity (byte 0)))))

LeafScore.Name: System drive usage (%)
LeafScore.Description: If the system drive usage is: • More than 90% ➔ 0 • 80-90% ➔ 2 • 65-80% ➔ 5 • 50-65% ➔ 8 • Less than 50% ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

LeafScore.Name: System drive free space (absolute)
LeafScore.Description: If the system drive free space is: • Less than 5GB ➔ 0 • 5-20GB ➔ 5 • More than 20GB ➔ 10 • If no info ➔ "-"

CompositeScore.Name: Windows 10 compatibility
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates if the device is compatible with Windows 10 • '-' ➔ not compatible • 0 ➔ not compatible • 1 ➔ compatible

Computation.Name: Compatible
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Ready")))(compute number_of_packages))))

Computation.Name: Unspecified
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Unspecified")))(compute number_of_packages))))

Computation.Name: Out of scope
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Out of scope")))(compute number_of_packages))))

LeafScore.Name: Not compatible packages
LeafScore.Description: Indicates if the device has packages not compatible with Windows 10 . • 1 ➔ presence of packages not compatible

Computation.Name: Not compatible
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Not ready")))(compute number_of_packages))))

CompositeScore.Name: Windows 10 software readiness
CompositeScore.Description: Indicates if all packages in the device are ready for with Windows 10 • '-' ➔ not ready • 0 ➔ not ready • 1 ➔ ready

Computation.Name: Ready
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Ready")))(compute number_of_packages))))

Computation.Name: Unspecified
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Unspecified")))(compute number_of_packages))))

Computation.Name: Out of scope
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Out of scope")))(compute number_of_packages))))

LeafScore.Name: Not ready packages
LeafScore.Description: Indicates if the device has packages not ready for Windows 10 . • 1 ➔ presence of packages not ready

Computation.Name: Not ready
Computation.Query: (select (id)(from device(with package(where package (eq #"Win10 Package readiness" (enum "Not ready")))(compute number_of_packages))))

Computation.Name: GoToMeeting cost saving
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (where binary (eq executable_name (pattern "ciscojabber.exe"))) (where user (eq #"campaign:Skype for Busines satisfaction/Positive points" (string "What is Skype for Business?"))) (between now-1d now) (compute number_of_executions)))

CompositeScore.Name: Experience demo
CompositeScore.Description: It is based on hard metrics measured on the endpoint and on the user sentiment collected via Nexthink Engage.

Computation.Name: Exists
Computation.Query: (select (id device_uid) (from device (with user_activity (where user (eq sid (sid "S-1-5-21-246144122-2010861750-2438041170-9999"))) (compute number_of_devices) (between now-1d now))))

Computation.Name: Exists
Computation.Query: (select (id device_uid) (from device (with user_activity (where user (eq sid (sid "S-1-5-21-246144122-2010861750-2438041170-9999"))) (compute number_of_devices) (between now-1d now))))

Computation.Name: Exists
Computation.Query: (select (id device_uid) (from device (with user_activity (where user (eq sid (sid "S-1-5-21-246144122-2010861750-2438041170-9999"))) (compute number_of_devices) (between now-1d now))))

LeafScore.Name: Time saved
LeafScore.Description: Time saved

Computation.Name: Self-healing actions
Computation.Description: Self-healing actions
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (compute number_of_applications) (between midnight-7d midnight))))

Computation.Name: Self-help actions
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device (with execution (compute number_of_executables) (between midnight-7d midnight))))

Computation.Name: Multiplication factor for self-healing actions
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))

Computation.Name: Multiplication factor for self-help actions
Computation.Query: (select (id) (from device))
